FAQ / Custom Cards / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Characters /
WARNING: This card is a part of a custom card set; it is not an official Wizards of the Coast TF:TCG card.

Seaspray, Consummate Sailor

  1. Does Seaspray’s first Alt ability count himself? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes.
  2. What does “on your team” mean? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Presently on the battlefield under your control and not in the KO area-pulled from starting team.
  3. Seaspray’s bot ability says “each character.” Does that work if I have two 9-stars with Seaspray in Bot mode? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Each of your 9-stars would get the +1 ATK in this case.
  4. What happens when my highest star character gets KO’d? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    The Bot mode ability is always checking, so the next highest star character or characters would now receive the bonus. If Seaspray is your character with the most stars, he will give himself the bonus.
